Description of incident: On July 23, REI discovered that a third-party may have accessed REI customer accounts without authorization obtaining email addresses and passwords.For those affected who have further questions about this incident, please contact them at privacy@rei.com or 1-800-426-48401-800-426-4840 Monday through Sunday 4 a.m. to 11 p.m. Pacific Time.
